column3: “This is the most impressive I have ever had. It is wonderful. Love S6. The arousal feeling is very good.”
“Just vaped 75mg in the o-pen and my energy has skyrocket. I feel pumped to start my day. Zero couch lock. I don't know why my sentences are like. I don't care. I love serious 6. Like, seriously.”
“The arousal factor is concerning when two guys are about to smoke this in a small space.”
“I have a friend who gave me  a sample and a clone! The young lady prospers very well, and I must admit I enjoy the taste and effects of this both to my head and my body.”
“I saw some negative reviews, for me this stuff is so potent! Smells and tastes amazing, got me really high. A+ for me”

“I wish I could say 4.5 I really liked this strain personally.  It addresses a multitude of issues, like pain, nausea energy and even tingly pleasant body sensations, I'll take it :)  Yes it has a bit of a lemon pledge flavour profile to start but it does narrow down to a mild and pleasant citrus feel after vaping for over 8 minutes.  I have to give this medicated state an A+++ as I've been searching now for just over...”

“A M A Z I N G.
A+”
“Pretty good sativa, don't usually get sativa. Had me up for a while. Definitely gave me a burst of energy. Uplifting head high. Tastes very citrus and lemony. Overall a good experience!”
“very exotic light in effect, but the effect seems to linger.”
“I love it! wish I could find this in arizona! BC wellness carried it and now we can't get it.”
“love it has a great citrus smell rolled a kew size joint and it got me and my girl and my boy pretty fucking lit lol..”
“Tried this strain in keif. It offers a crisp, clear clean body high that is excellent for focus and energy. No couch lock, no fuZzy head.  I would love to find this in flower.”
“Pretty good sativa, don't usually get sativa. Had me up for a while. Definitely gave me a burst of energy. Uplifting head high. Tastes very citrus and lemony. Overall a good experience!”

“I got this in a vape cartridge. Upon getting I was a little nervous that it would give me some paranoia but it did the quit opposite. This strain was what got me threw a very stressful two months. Suddenly working in a stressful environment was somewhat tolerable.”
“Didn't help me at all , still trying to get help from dispensary or kind concentrates on a refund or exchange of some kind , I'd avoid .”
“I was having a panic attack, but I'm fine now.”
“I bought some kind concentrates RSO a week ago and ended up using almost 3/4 the tube in couple hours with almost no effect and no medicinal effects.”
“Unimpressed overall... Very light and not very helpful for pain or sleep”
